ud3.2:6.2: maṁ → mama (sya-all) | nikkhamantassa → nikkhamantaṁ (pts-vp-pli1 aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pāṭhantaraṁ)
ud3.2:7.1: samiñjitaṁ → sammiñjitaṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1) | samiñjeyya → sammiñjeyya (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1)
ud3.2:9.3: saṅkhyampi → saṅkhampi (bj) | nopeti kalabhāgampi nopeti upanidhimpi nopeti → na upeti, kalampi na upeti, kalabhāgampi na upeti, upanidhimpi na upeti (si), na upeti, kalabhāgampi na upeti, upanidhimpi na upeti (sya-all, pts1ed)
ud3.2:10.3: bhagavati brahmacariye”ti → bhagavā brahmacariyeti (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); bhagavā brahmacariyanti (mr)
ud3.2:16.3: kho tvaṁ, nanda → kho te nanda (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); kho nanda (mr)
